checks.description: Verify navigation to Daily Wage Calculation page is accessible from Settings > Payroll menu
checks.selector_hint: Settings menu > Payroll section > Daily Wage Calculation link
checks.assertion: Daily Wage Calculation page loads successfully

checks.description: Verify calculation basis options exist (calendar days, working days, custom days)
checks.selector_hint: Calculation basis selector or radio buttons
checks.assertion: All three calculation basis options are visible and selectable

checks.description: Verify salary components selection controls are present
checks.selector_hint: Salary components checkbox list or multi-select
checks.assertion: Salary components selection interface is available and functional

checks.description: Verify page displays information about month length variations (31 days, 28 days, etc.)
checks.selector_hint: Help text, tooltips, or informational sections
checks.assertion: Content about calendar day variations is present or accessible

nav.canonical: Settings > Payroll > End of Service eligibility > Configure

checks.description: Verify navigation to End of Service eligibility configuration page
checks.selector_hint: Settings > Payroll > End of Service eligibility > Configure link
checks.assertion: End of Service eligibility configuration page loads successfully

checks.description: Verify salary components options exist (Basic Only vs Basic + Allowances)
checks.selector_hint: Salary components radio buttons or dropdown
checks.assertion: Both salary component options are visible and selectable

checks.description: Verify calculation method options exist (calendar days, working days, custom days)
checks.selector_hint: Calculation method selector
checks.assertion: All calculation method options are available

checks.description: Verify override indicator is visible showing which paid leave-type policies will be overwritten
checks.selector_hint: Override warning message or indicator section
checks.assertion: Override information is displayed for super admins

checks.description: Verify navigation to Daily wage calculation settings for proration configuration
checks.selector_hint: Settings > Payroll > Daily wage calculation path
checks.assertion: Daily wage calculation page is accessible

checks.description: Verify calculation bases are selectable (custom days, calendar days, working days)
checks.selector_hint: Calculation basis selection controls
checks.assertion: All calculation basis options are available for selection

checks.description: Verify UI state changes when payroll month is open (warning about prorated salary transactions)
checks.selector_hint: Warning message or status indicator for open payroll month
checks.assertion: Appropriate warning or status message appears when payroll month is open

nav.canonical: Settings > Leaves > Leave Policies > Add new policy > Unpaid Leave option > calculation method > day calculation type

checks.description: Verify navigation to Leave Policies configuration in Settings > Leaves
checks.selector_hint: Settings > Leaves > Leave Policies menu path
checks.assertion: Leave Policies page is accessible

checks.description: Verify override indicator exists showing formula is greyed-out or disabled due to payroll override
checks.selector_hint: Greyed-out formula field or override indicator in unpaid leave configuration
checks.assertion: Override indicator is visible (greyed-out field, disabled state, or precedence message)

checks.description: Verify UI state shows that payroll settings take precedence over leave policy formula
checks.selector_hint: Disabled field, tooltip, or precedence messaging
checks.assertion: UI clearly indicates payroll configuration overrides leave policy

nav.canonical: Settings > Leaves > Leave Policies > Add new policy > Unpaid Leave option > calculation method > day calculation type

checks.description: Verify navigation to unpaid leave deduction configuration page
checks.selector_hint: Settings > Leaves > Leave Policies > Unpaid Leave option path
checks.assertion: Unpaid leave configuration page loads successfully

checks.description: Verify override indicator showing global configuration supersedes policy-level settings
checks.selector_hint: Override message, disabled fields, or precedence indicator
checks.assertion: Override indicator is visible showing global settings take precedence

checks.description: Verify UI state shows calculation method field is disabled or greyed-out when global override is active
checks.selector_hint: Disabled calculation method field or greyed-out state
checks.assertion: Field state reflects that global configuration is in effect

nav.canonical: Settings > Payroll > End of Service eligibility > Configure

checks.description: Verify navigation to End of Service eligibility configuration
checks.selector_hint: Settings > Payroll > End of Service eligibility > Configure
checks.assertion: EOS configuration page is accessible

checks.description: Verify UI displays daily wage formula configuration (basic + allowances / 30)
checks.selector_hint: Formula display, calculation method label, or configuration summary
checks.assertion: Daily wage formula is visible and displayed correctly

checks.description: Verify UI shows stored daily rate value in remarks or summary section
checks.selector_hint: Remarks field, summary section, or stored rate display
checks.assertion: Stored daily rate is displayed in UI

nav.canonical: Settings > Leaves > Leave Policies > Add new policy > Unpaid Leave option > calculation method > day calculation type

checks.description: Verify navigation to leave policy calculation configuration
checks.selector_hint: Settings > Leaves > Leave Policies > calculation method path
checks.assertion: Leave policy calculation page is accessible

checks.description: Verify override indicator showing policy configuration is subject to system override
checks.selector_hint: Override message or indicator in day calculation type section
checks.assertion: Override indicator is present and visible

checks.description: Verify UI displays day calculation type options (calendar days, working days, custom days)
checks.selector_hint: Day calculation type selector or radio buttons
checks.assertion: Day calculation type options are visible and accessible

nav.canonical: Settings > Leaves > Leave Policies > Add new policy > Unpaid Leave option > calculation method > day calculation type

checks.description: Verify navigation to unpaid leave configuration page
checks.selector_hint: Settings > Leaves > Leave Policies > Unpaid Leave option path
checks.assertion: Unpaid leave configuration page is accessible

checks.description: Verify UI displays remarks field showing daily rate calculation details
checks.selector_hint: Remarks section or daily rate display field
checks.assertion: Remarks field is visible and displays daily rate information

checks.description: Verify remarks display includes number of days used in calculation
checks.selector_hint: Remarks text showing day count (e.g., '31 days', '29 days')
checks.assertion: Day count is displayed in remarks section

nav.canonical: Settings > Leaves > Leave Policies > Add new policy > Unpaid Leave option > calculation method > day calculation type

checks.description: Verify navigation to unpaid leave deduction configuration
checks.selector_hint: Settings > Leaves > Leave Policies > Unpaid Leave option path
checks.assertion: Unpaid leave configuration page is accessible

checks.description: Verify UI displays daily rate field in remarks or summary section
checks.selector_hint: Daily rate display field or remarks section
checks.assertion: Daily rate is displayed in UI

checks.description: Verify daily rate display shows stored rate from leave occurrence month (not recalculated from payroll month)
checks.selector_hint: Daily rate value in remarks or stored rate field
checks.assertion: Displayed daily rate reflects the initially calculated rate
